horizontal.desc: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode

options.desc: Available options that the user can select from. For best performance freeze the items in the list.

virtualListSliceSize.desc: Number of options to render in the virtual list

virtualListItemDefaultSize.desc: Default size of an option (height or width for horizontal mode), in px - will be used for rendering the initial list. Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item.

virtualListMaxPadding.desc: Maximum accepted height for one padding element

tag.desc: HTML tag to render as container

bg-placeholder.desc: The list will show a background simulating scroll while rendering new list items. Requires a background color to be set on the virtual list or on its parent

scrollTarget.desc: CSS selector or DOM element to be used as scroll container instead of the root element of virtual list

default.desc: Template slot for defining the list item; Suggestion: QItem

index.desc: Item index in the options list

item.desc: Item data -- its value is taken from 'options' prop

scrollTo.desc: Scroll the list to the item with the specified index (0 based)

key.desc: The index of the list item (0 based)
